sqlMap.select: select grade_name from grade where grade_no = #grade_no#
select nvl(sum(MYPROD_COUNT),0) from product where customer_no = #customer_no#
select member_point from member where customer_no = #customer_no#
select b.mtheater_name from (select MTHEATER_NO from favorite where customer_no =#customer_no#) a, mtheater b where a.mtheater_no = b.mtheater_no
sqlMap.update: update favorite set mtheater_no = (select mtheater_no from mtheater where mtheater_name = #mtheater_name#) where customer_no = #customer_no#
sqlMap.insert: insert into favorite values(#customer_no#, (select mtheater_no from mtheater where mtheater_name = #mtheater_name#))
sqlMap.update: update member set member_name = #member_name#, member_mail = #member_mail#, member_pass = #member_pass#, member_birth = #member_birth#, member_tel = #member_tel# where customer_no = #customer_no#
sqlMap.select: select e.movie_name, f.theater_name ,f.theater_price, g.mtheater_name, h.seat_row, h.seat_col, h.screen_start, h.screen_end, h.ticket_no, h.screen_day from movie e , theater f, mtheater g, (select a.seat_row,a.seat_col,b.movie_no, b.theater_no, b.screen_start, b.screen_end, c.ticket_no, c.screen_day from seat a, screen b, (select a.seat_no, a.screen_day, a.screen_no, b.ticket_no from reserve a, (select ticket_no from ticket where customer_no = #customer_no#) b where a.ticket_no = b.ticket_no) c where a.seat_no = C.seat_no and b.screen_no = C.screen_no) h where e.movie_no = h.movie_no and f.theater_no = h.theater_no and f.mtheater_no = g.mtheater_no order by h.ticket_no desc
select a.prod_no, a.prod_name, b.myprod_count from prod a, (select * from product where customer_no = #customer_no#) b where a.prod_no = b.prod_no
select b.movie_name, a.review_grade, a.review_content, a.movie_no, a.customer_no from review a , movie b where a.movie_no = b.movie_no and a.customer_no = #customer_no#
sqlMap.delete: delete from review where movie_no = #movie_no# and customer_no = #customer_no#
sqlMap.select: select b.pay_no, b.customer_no, b.prod_no, b.pay_amount, b.pay_date, a.prod_name from prod a, (select * from paymentlist where customer_no = #customer_no#) b where a.prod_no = b.prod_no
